Content.Title: List

Images.Alt: Picture of the a basic palythrough list.

Text: The program lists all the games you have yet to play in this view. They way to add/remove/edit the games is the buttons on the left and you can save you changes by pressing save.

Content.Title: Add Game

Images.Alt: Gif of adding a game to the list.

Text: Press the '+' button to add a game to the list and it will prompt you for the game number. Keep in mind you can't add a number that is already on the list!

Content.Title: Remove Game

Images.Alt: Gif of removing a game from the list.

Text: Select the game you want to remove and click the '-' button to remove it. Warning! This can't be undone and although you can just re-add it will remove it from any request list that has that number!

Images.Alt: Gif of adding one to every element and subtracting one.

Text: If a number gets insterted in your list and every number after gets added to or if a game gets deleted so even game after gets -1 you can use the "+1" and "-1" buttons to either add or subtract one from ever game from selection onwards!
